summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for Gratitude America, Ltd. for the month of October 2018. It includes information on account balances, deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting the financial activities of the account during this period.

persons.name: Steuart Oldfield
persons.context: Steuart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

events.title: Account Statement Period
events.description: The document summarizes the financial activities of Gratitude America, Ltd. for the month of October 2018.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance for Gratitude America, Ltd. as of October 31, 2018, was $1,967,637.77.
The document details various transactions including deposits, withdrawals, and service charges.
An outgoing foreign transfer of $57,897.17 was made during the statement period.
Interest payments totaling $168.69 were credited to the account during October 2018.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
